welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Knutsford, a charming town known for its picturesque streets, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
